isQuickScaleEnabled(java.lang.Object).Description: Use @B_android#support#v4#view#ScaleGestureDetectorCompat#isQuickScaleEnabled_E@ that takes @B_android#view#ScaleGestureDetector_E@ instead of @B_java#lang#Object_E@. Returns whether the quick scale gesture, in which the user performs a double tap followed by a swipe, should perform scaling. See @B_android#support#v4#view#ScaleGestureDetectorCompat#setQuickScaleEnabled_E@.

Parameters: boolean: true to enable quick scaling, false to disable
setQuickScaleEnabled(java.lang.Object, b.Description: Use @B_android#support#v4#view#ScaleGestureDetectorCompat#setQuickScaleEnabled_E@ that takes @B_android#view#ScaleGestureDetector_E@ instead of @B_java#lang#Object_E@. Sets whether the associated @B_android#view#ScaleGestureDetector#OnScaleGestureListener_E@ should receive onScale callbacks when the user performs a doubleTap followed by a swipe. Note that this is enabled by default if the app targets API 19 and newer.
